General.Name: Asflow Co. Ltd.
General.Description: ASFLOW Co., LTD. engages in the production of components and materials that are used in manufacturing high-purity pipelines for semiconductor equipment and special gas lines in South Korea. Its products include tubes and pipes, fittings, valve and pressure regulators, and filter diffusers, as well as components. The company also exports its products to China, Japan, and Europe. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Hwaseong, South Korea.
